title: Solitary Sky
description: My name is Lilah...and this was not supposed to be my life.I moved to Gentian to get away from my so-called mother...to finally be in control of my own life....to live with Gram and spend senior year with my best friend, Val. I wanted a normal life for once. My plans didn't include weird, prophetic dreams--or watching Hunter Grayson walk right out of them. Any sense of control I thought I had was shattered in that moment as fate took the reins of my life, thrusting me into Hunter's orbit. Suddenly he was all I wanted to know....until I leaned way too much. The Grayson brothers were more than just the new guys in town. They were more than human.Now I'm finding their secrets go even deeper. Antiquated debts have been resurrected. Evil has come to collect, and I'll be the one to pay.With my life.
author: Shannon Taylor Hodnett
